docstr:
`UMASK` â€” Set the file creation mask ### Description Sets the file creation mask to `MASK`. If called as a function, it returns the old value. If called as a subroutine and argument `OLD` if it is supplied, it is set to the old value. See `umask(2)`. ### Syntax | `OLD = UMASK(MASK)`
### Arguments . | `OLD` | (Optional) Shall be a scalar of type `INTEGER`. ### Standard GNU extension ### Class Subroutine, function
